original_title: UFC Fight Night 9: Stevenson vs. Guillard
overview: UFC Fight Night 9: Stevenson vs. Guillard was an event held on April 5, 2007, at The Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas, Nevada. The main event was Joe Stevenson vs. Melvin Guillard in the lightweight division.
title: UFC Fight Night 9: Stevenson vs. Guillard
